constraints.name: path_constraint
constraints.description: 路径必须经过所有指定颜色的节点（图中路径约束）
constraints.formal: ∀ (u, v), path(u, v) must include all nodes with color i

constraints.name: distinctness
constraints.description: 路径中的节点不能重复（无环路径约束）
constraints.formal: ∀ (u, v), path(u, v) contains no repeated nodes

constraints.name: ordering
constraints.description: 点对 (u, v) 满足 u < v（有序性约束）
